Modul de.hitec.nhplus
Package de.hitec.nhplus.datastorage

Klasse RoomDao

java.lang.Object
de.hitec.nhplus.datastorage.DaoImp<Room>
de.hitec.nhplus.datastorage.RoomDao
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
Dao<Room>
public class RoomDao extends DaoImp<Room>
Implements the Interface DaoImp. Overrides methods to generate specific PreparedStatements, to execute the specific SQL Statements.

  • Feldübersicht

    Von Klasse geerbte Felder de.hitec.nhplus.datastorage.DaoImp

    connection

    • getInstanceFromResultSet

      protected Room getInstanceFromResultSet(ResultSet result) throws SQLException
      Maps a ResultSet of one room to an object of Room.
      Angegeben von:
      getInstanceFromResultSet in Klasse DaoImp<Room>
      Parameter:
      result - ResultSet with a single row. Columns will be mapped to an object of class Room.
      Gibt zurück:
      Object of class Room with the data from the resultSet.
      Löst aus:
      SQLException

    • getListFromResultSet

      protected ArrayList<Room> getListFromResultSet(ResultSet result) throws SQLException
      Maps a ResultSet of all rooms to an ArrayList of Room objects.
      Angegeben von:
      getListFromResultSet in Klasse DaoImp<Room>
      Parameter:
      result - ResultSet with all rows. The Columns will be mapped to objects of class Room.
      Gibt zurück:
      ArrayList with objects of class Room of all rows in the ResultSet.
      Löst aus:
      SQLException
